channel.title: Annie Elise x 10 to LIFE Page
channel.description: Annie Elise x 10 to LIFE Page

item.title: Single Mom's Life Taken in Front of Her 5 Kids
item.description: A heartbreaking case unfolds as a single mother loses her life in front of her five children. Authorities continue to investigate the circumstances with care.

media:content.media:title: Single Mom's Life Taken in Front of Her 5 Kids
media:content.media:description: A heartbreaking case unfolds as a single mother loses her life in front of her five children. Authorities continue to investigate the circumstances with care.
media:content.media:credit: Annie Elise x 10 to LIFE Page

item.title: Why Would Taylor Turn on Her Attorney?
item.description: Taylor’s unexpected decision to part ways with her attorney raises questions about the reasons behind the split and its impact on her case.

item.title: The Unsettling Story Behind Janet Abaroa's Case
item.description: In 2005, 25-year-old Janet Abaroa was found stabbed in her Durham, NC home. A detective’s hunch about her contact lenses contradicted her husband’s timeline—ultimately exposing the truth.

item.title: The Case of Kelsey Smith: A Story of Tragedy
item.description: On June 2, 2007, 18‑year‑old Kelsey Smith was abducted from an Overland Park Target parking lot. Surveillance footage, phone ping data, and fingerprints led to Edwin Hall’s life sentence.

item.title: 17-Year-Old's Deadly Act Followed by TikTok Cry for Help: Sarah Grace Patrick
item.description: Sarah Grace Patrick, 17, faces charges of killing her mother and stepfather. She posted tearful TikToks and even asked influencers to cover the case before turning herself in. Investigation remains ongoing.

item.title: Union County father confessed to taking daughter’s life
item.description: Joshua Lee Burgess entered the Union County sheriff’s office and admitted to taking the life of his 15-year-old daughter. He was later sentenced to death for the crime.

item.title: Walmart abduction case that shook Jacksonville
item.description: In June 2013, 8-year-old Cherish Perrywinkle was abducted from a Walmart by a registered sex offender. Surveillance footage, DNA evidence, and her mother’s instincts helped convict Donald Smith, now on death row.

item.title: Tried to Eliminate her 2 Daughters to Teach Him a Lesson
item.description: A mother is accused of targeting her own daughters in an alleged attempt to send a message to their father, prompting a serious investigation.

item.title: Oklahoma pediatrician charged in daughter’s death
item.description: Dr. Neha Gupta is accused of staging her 4-year-old daughter’s drowning in a Miami AirBnB pool. An autopsy showed no water in the lungs and injuries consistent with smothering—she now faces first‑degree murder charges.

item.title: The Dark Side of an Amish Man's Online Dating Life
item.description: An Amish man’s journey into online dating reveals unexpected challenges and a darker side of digital connection beyond his traditional world.

item.title: What Happened to Five-Year-Old Haleigh Cummings?
item.description: Five‑year‑old Haleigh disappeared from her Satsuma, Florida home in February 2009. Despite thousands of tips and searches, her case remains an unsolved homicide and open AMBER Alert.

item.title: Nurse Husband Got Rid of María Using Hospital Supplies
item.description: A nurse anesthetist in Texas was convicted of murdering his wife, Maria Muñoz, by injecting her with toxic hospital drugs. Her journal entries and doorbell footage helped prove it wasn’t suicide.

item.title: Remains of missing teen Susana Morales found
item.description: Sixteen‑year‑old Susana Morales vanished in July 2022 while walking home in Norcross, GA. Her remains were discovered in February 2023. A former officer now faces charges of murder and kidnapping.

item.title: This Case Gets Much Worse
item.description: 19‑year‑old Madison Brooks was allegedly assaulted and later struck by a vehicle in Baton Rouge after leaving a bar intoxicated. Four men now face rape charges in connection with her death.

item.title: The Mystery Behind the Kendy Howard Case
item.description: The Mystery Behind the Kendy Howard Case

item.title: Tragic Find in Search for Missing Woman
item.description: Tragic Find in Search for Missing Woman

item.title: The mysterious death of Paulette Gebara Farah
item.description: Four-year-old Paulette disappeared on March 22, 2010, in Mexico. Found dead nine days later in her bedroom, authorities ruled it accidental asphyxia—though public questions remain.

item.title: Planned Date Turns Tragic: Sade Robinson's Story
item.description: Planned Date Turns Tragic: Sade Robinson's Story

item.title: Inside the Shocking Turpin Family Home
item.description: Inside the Shocking Turpin Family Home

item.title: Scott Didn't Wanna Be A Father, He Did An Awful Thing
item.description: Scott Didn't Wanna Be A Father, He Did An Awful Thing
